hero.title: Bustani Foundation for Community Service
hero.subtitle: Where dreams grow with every donation

about.description: Bustani Foundation for Community Service plants hope in every home and child, where your donations turn into sponsorship for needy families and education and health for children, in addition to sustainable food and housing support. More than five hundred beneficiaries live a better life every month thanks to your generosity, and together we develop the community step by step.

zakat.title: Your Zakat Changes Lives
zakat.description: Zakat is not just spending... rather, it is an act of worship that brings one closer to God, a purification for the soul and wealth, a bridge between the rich and the poor, a guarantee for the stability of society, and a divine promise of blessing and forgiveness.
zakat.ctaText: Donate now with the Zakat of your wealth through Bustani Foundation for Community Service
